md:
giải nghĩa từ "competitive" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Competitive (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Having or showing a strong desire to win or be successful.
	+ Vietnamese: Cạnh tranh, cạnh tranh gay gắt, quyết thắng.
	+ Example sentence: The company has a competitive spirit, always striving to be the best in the industry.
	+ Related words: rivalry, opponent, champion, winner.
	+ Antonyms: cooperative, collaborative, harmonious.

* Competitive (noun)
	+ Meaning: A person or entity that competes with others.
	+ Vietnamese: Đối thủ, người cạnh tranh.
	+ Example sentence: The company sees its main competitive as a major threat to its market share.
	+ Related words: rival, opponent, contender, challenger.
	+ Antonyms: ally, partner, collaborator.

Note: The word "competitive" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are based on the most common meanings of the word.

  • Competitive (adjective)

  • Competitive (noun)

    • Vietnamese: Đối thủ, người cạnh tranh.
    • Example sentence: The company sees its main competitive as a major threat to its market share.
    • Related words: rival, opponent, contender, challenger.
    • Antonyms: ally, partner, collaborator.

Note: The word "competitive" can have different meanings depending on the context in which it is used. The above explanations are based on the most common meanings of the word.
